V.iii.3.6.b
.
Use of the COVID-19 Special Issue Indicator
The COVID-19 Veterans Benefits Management System contention-based special issue indicator referenced in
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, 10.3.a
should be used for all COVID-19 claims regardless of the theory of SC being utilized in the claim.
Reference
:Â  For more information on the use of special issue indicators, see
M21-4, Appendix E.2
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 3 - Infectious Diseases, Immune Disorders, and Nutritional Deficiencies
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 3, Section None
